items.title_zh: Hismile 牙膏  –  能量飲料味 (60g)
items.desc_zh:
🥤 真正能量飲料風味，微甜氣泡感，刷牙也能感受活力刺激
🌟 含氟配方，有效清潔牙齒，防蛀護齒
🌿 溫和不傷琺瑯質，日常使用安心無慮
😋 專為能量飲料愛好者設計，刷牙也能享受熟悉的刺激口感
items.desc_en:
🥤 Authentic energy drink flavor with a fizzy-sweet kick—get your boost even while brushing
🌟 Fluoride formula effectively cleans teeth and protects against cavities
🌿 Gentle on enamel, safe for daily use
😋 Designed for energy drink lovers—enjoy the familiar bold flavor every time you brush
